metadata.prompt: An engaging graphic showing three separate, clearly labeled spray bottles. They are labeled "LOW-LEVEL," "HIGH-LEVEL," and "10% SOLUTION." Each bottle has a different color liquid (e.g., light blue, medium blue, reddish-orange) for visual distinction.
A shot of a person in stylish cleaning gear mopping a beautiful, clean salon floor. The motion is active and energetic. A text overlay reads: "LOW-LEVEL: For general surfaces."
A close-up of clean combs and brushes being submerged in a container of disinfectant. A text overlay reads: "HIGH-LEVEL: For disinfecting your tools."

A simulated, non-graphic image of a red drop on a white countertop. A gloved hand is seen coming into the frame with a spray bottle clearly labeled "10% SOLUTION." Text overlay: "10% SOLUTION: For blood spills ONLY."
A split-screen image. On the left, a mop bucket with a green checkmark. On the right, the same mop bucket near the red drop with a large red 'X' over it, showing you can't use the wrong tool.
A graphic showing three icons: a floor, a comb, and a blood drop. Lines connect each icon to its correctly labeled bleach solution from the first image.
A final shot of a confident salon professional, leaning against their impeccably clean station. They look knowledgeable and in control.
